desc: WE PURSUE OUR MISSION, AND OUR LADY’S MISSION, IN SEVERAL WAYS: Selling religious goods in our online store and Amazing Grace bookstore in Evans City, PA Supporting more than 1,000 children in need at the orphanages and schools we founded in Nigeria and India.

layout.text: Gospa Missions is a nonprofit Catholic religous charity founded by Thomas Rutkoski for the purpose of evangelizing the world’s people to the Catholic Church. We achieve our mission by holding conferences and retreats, hosting pilgrimages, operating a religious goods retail store online and in Evans City, PA, and funding two orphanages and schools that we founded.
